sentences.en: A damaged hamstring has ruled him out of contention for Wednesday's international against Spain.
sentences.cn: 腘绳肌腱拉伤使他无法参加星期三对抗西班牙的国际比赛。

sentences.en: But Lend - lease isn't the only bone of contention here.
sentences.cn: 然而《租借法案》并不是这里争论的唯一焦点.

sentences.en: He listed Spain, Mexico, Russia, and France to support his contention.
sentences.cn: 他又列举了西班牙 、 墨西哥 、 俄国和法国来证实他的说法.

sentences.en: His case has become a source of contention between civil liberties activists and the government.
sentences.cn: 他的案子已变成了公民自由活动家们和政府之间的争论缘由。

sentences.en: It is his contention that taxes are too low.

sentences.cn: 我的观点是，在暴力关系中总是潜伏着死亡和谋杀的可能。

sentences.en: My contention is that male hormones are the ultimate cause of trouble on this planet.
sentences.cn: 我的论点是:男性荷尔蒙是这个星球上一切麻烦之源.

sentences.en: My contention is that the scheme will never work.

sentences.en: The pay increase is the key point of contention.

sentences.cn: 他们一般都尽量避免会引起彼此不和的话题。

sentences.en: This evidence supports their contention that the outbreak of violence was prearranged.
sentences.cn: 这一证据证实了他们的观点，即此次突发暴力事件是有预谋的。

sentences.en: This is an issue of great contention at the moment.

sentences.en: Three players are in contention to win the title.
sentences.cn: 三个运动员在争夺这个项目的冠军.

sentences.en: Truth does not fear contention . The more the truth is debated, the clearer it becomes.
sentences.cn: 真理越辩越明, 真理不怕辩论.

sentences.en: We're in trouble; this is no time for contention.
sentences.cn: 我们处境很困难, 现在不是争论的时候.
